project_descr: Promoting and harmonizing integrated Local Development planning and programming

outputs.output_descr:
BiH municipalities undertake integrated, inclusive and environmentally sustainable local development. This is to be secured via the: 
(1) Formulation of a high-quality local development planning and its application to the BiH context.
(2) Improved strategic management, development project delivery and direct support 
(3) Facilitation of external civil society 'check' and participation.
